overview:
## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the save request executes successfully; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

It is recommended that you do not access objects in the save request from other threads when it is in the process of being executed, because it may modify the contacts in the process. A save request only applies the changes to the objects. If there are overlapping changes with multiple or concurrent [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNSaveRequest] then the last saved change wins.

# execute(_:)

**Instance Method**

Executes a save request and returns success or failure.

## Declaration

```swift
func execute(_ saveRequest: CNSaveRequest) throws
```

## Parameters

- **saveRequest**: The save request to execute.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the save request executes successfully; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

It is recommended that you do not access objects in the save request from other threads when it is in the process of being executed, because it may modify the contacts in the process. A save request only applies the changes to the objects. If there are overlapping changes with multiple or concurrent [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNSaveRequest] then the last saved change wins.
title: execute(_:)
